Pop by Booth 𝗡-𝟱𝟮𝟬𝟬 𝗮𝘁 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗡𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗵 𝗘𝘅𝗽𝗼 and catch up with Quantropi Inc. CTO Michael Redding. Bring your questions on the Y2Q Quantum Threat, recent advancements in quantum technology and what it means to today’s encryption, the benefits of BYOK, or anything else cyber-related!

Register NOW with 52EQUANTRXP for a FREE Expo pass!

Schedule a meeting with Mike today!
Learn more: http://bit.ly/3GloXBb

#RSAC2023 #BringItOn #Quantropi #Y2Q #technology #cryptography #quantumcryptography #Cybersecurity #QuantumSecurityBoard

QiSpace™ is the world’s first hybrid SaaS cryptography platform providing TrUE quantum-secure cryptographic functions and quantum entropy services – for product manufacturers, the IoT & embedded space, governments, and enterprises.

QiSpace™ protects data and communications from quantum and AI attacks.
Attending RSA Conference? Come visit booth N-5200 to see QiSpace™ – LIVE – powering use cases for IoT and Enterprise Security including the world’s first Quantum-Secure Boot Loader.

Also, get your hands on some epic swag – notebooks, beanies, hoodies, and Quantropi’s Series 2 Icons of Cryptography collectibles.

Register NOW with 52EQUANTRXP for a FREE Expo pass!

Schedule a meeting with Quantropi today!
Learn more: http://bit.ly/3GloXBb

#Breaking 
Check out the latest edition of Techopia – Quantropi Inc. has been featured as a NEXT-GEN company!

Queen St. Fare hosted a truly incredible night to toast the launch of the publication and to celebrate the success and growth of the industry. The event was attended by Quantropi Inc. CEO James Nguyen and VP Raj Narula

Many thanks to Ottawa Business Journal, @eycanada_ and the sponsors of the magazine for this honour and for bringing together the brightest stars of the Ottawa tech community together for one fabulous night.

#ottawabusinessjournal #Quantropi#BringItOn #Y2Q #QuantumReadyBoard #informationsecurity #quantumcomputing #technology #cyptography #QuantumComputing #Cybersecurity #ottawabusiness #EY

Happy International Women’s Day! Today, we celebrate the incredible achievements of women throughout history. We are proud to highlight and honour 𝗠𝗮𝗿𝘆 𝗖𝗮𝗿𝘁𝘄𝗿𝗶𝗴𝗵𝘁 through this special digital portrait by Eric Chan.

𝗪𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗶𝘀 𝘀𝗵𝗲 𝗯𝗲𝘀𝘁 𝗸𝗻𝗼𝘄𝗻 𝗳𝗼𝗿?
Mary Cartwright was a British mathematician who was one of the pioneers in what would later be known as chaos theory – a relatively new branch of mathematics that deals with surprises, the unpredictability of events and the nonlinearity of life.

𝗪𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗱𝗶𝗱 𝘀𝗵𝗲 𝘄𝗶𝗻?
Cartwright has won numerous awards including being the first woman recipient of the prestigious De Morgan Medal, the highest award of the London Mathematical Society.

Interested in our limited edition “Icons of Cryptography” collectible series? Message us!

#happyinternationalwomensday #Quantropi #BringItOn

#TQIWebisodes #Part4

In this, the final part of our The Quantum Insider mini-series on the Y2Q Quantum Threat, Quantropi Inc. CTO Michael Redding walks the audience through QiSpace™, a hybrid SaaS platform which provides TrUE quantum-secure cryptographic functions – via three distinct product families: MASQ™, QEEP™, and SEQUR™. 

Watch the complete mini-series here: https://lnkd.in/gnwP6f67 

Quantropi Inc.’s QiSpace™ platform is the only fast, lightweight, and resource-efficient suite of cryptographic products and quantum entropy services that enable organizations to protect data, networks, systems and IoT devices, now and forever. 

Learn More: https://lnkd.in/g79xH39y

Welcome to the Quantropi Inc. team Jay Toth! 

Our new Senior Vice President, Sales. Prior to joining Quantropi, Jay was Chief Growth Officer at Kepro, responsible for the organization’s overall growth strategy in government markets. Before that, Jay held a progression of sales leadership and general management roles during his 17 years at Microsoft. 

#Quantropi  #BringItOn #SVP #Sales #JayToth

Now, even faster quantum entropy speeds and continued access to quantum-secure, crypto-agile asymmetric encryption for key encapsulation and digital signatures. 

Get access to TrUE quantum-secure cryptography today.

#IQT_Webisode_7  
𝗣𝗤𝗖 𝗧𝗶𝗺𝗲𝗹𝗶𝗻𝗲𝘀 𝗮𝗰𝗿𝗼𝘀𝘀 𝗜𝗻𝗱𝘂𝘀𝘁𝗿𝗶𝗲𝘀
In this, the final episode in this 7-part mini-series on migrating to a complete TrUE cryptographic system, CTO Michael Redding deep dives into how the deployment of PQC will work across different industries. 
Try QiSpace™ and receive quantum-secure, crypto-agile asymmetric encryption for key encapsulation and digital signatures. Submit your QiSpace™ trial request today to get started: https://lnkd.in/gwAu63Rp 

Catch the panel insights at Inside Quantum Technology, New York Oct. 2022 - ‘PQC Products: Who will use them and when’. 
Watch the complete mini-series here: http://bit.ly/3BecXim 
 
#quantum #community #security #quantumtechnology #Y2Q #QuantumThreat #BringItOn #Quantropi #cybersecurity #MichaelRedding #IQT #NewYork

IQT_Webisode_6 
𝗪𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝘀𝗵𝗼𝘂𝗹𝗱 𝗜 𝗤𝘂𝗮𝗻𝘁𝘂𝗺-𝗦𝗲𝗰𝘂𝗿𝗲? 𝗪𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗲 𝗱𝗼 𝗜 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘁?

In this, the sixth of a 7-part mini-series on migrating to a complete TrUE cryptographic system, CTO Michael Redding deep dives into different industry use cases of how organizations and governments can leverage Quantropi’s hybrid SaaS QiSpace™ platform to quantum-secure networks, systems, products, and applications. 

Try QiSpace™ and receive quantum-secure, crypto-agile asymmetric encryption for key encapsulation and digital signatures. 
Submit your QiSpace™ trial request today to get started: https://lp.quantropi.com/request-qispace 

Catch the panel insights at Inside Quantum Technology, New York Oct. 2022 - ‘PQC Products: Who will use them and when’. 
Watch the complete mini-series here: http://bit.ly/3BecXim 
 
#quantum #community #security #quantumtechnology #Y2Q #QuantumThreat #BringItOn #Quantropi #cybersecurity #MichaelRedding #IQT #NewYork

#IQT_Webisode_5 
𝗘𝗻𝘁𝗿𝗼𝗽𝘆 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗦𝗘𝗤𝗨𝗥 𝗤𝘂𝗮𝗻𝘁𝘂𝗺 𝗥𝗮𝗻𝗱𝗼𝗺 𝗡𝘂𝗺𝗯𝗲𝗿𝘀
In this, the fifth of a 7-part mini-series on migrating to a complete TrUE cryptographic system, Quantropi Inc. CTO Michael Redding shares the third and final TrUE building block of a complete cryptographic system- Entropy, including quantum key generation and digital distribution.

Learn how Quantropi’s SEQUR™ product suite enables synchronized quantum-secure entropy distribution to endpoints over any network including wireless networks – Digital QKD.
Submit your QiSpace™ trial request today to get started: https://lnkd.in/gwAu63Rp 

Catch the panel insights at Inside Quantum Technology, New York Oct. 2022 - ‘PQC Products: Who will use them and when’. 
Watch the complete mini-series here: http://bit.ly/3BecXim 

#quantum #community #security #quantumtechnology #Y2Q #QuantumThreat #BringItOn #Quantropi #cybersecurity #MichaelRedding #IQT #NewYork

#IQT_Webisode_4 
𝗨𝗻𝗰𝗲𝗿𝘁𝗮𝗶𝗻𝘁𝘆 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗤𝗘𝗘𝗣™ 𝗤𝘂𝗮𝗻𝘁𝘂𝗺-𝗦𝗲𝗰𝘂𝗿𝗲 𝗦𝘆𝗺𝗺𝗲𝘁𝗿𝗶𝗰 𝗘𝗻𝗰𝗿𝘆𝗽𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻
 
In this, the fourth of a 7-part mini-series on migrating to a complete TrUE cryptographic system, Quantropi Inc. CTO Michael Redding elaborates on the second TrUE building block of a complete cryptographic system – Uncertainty or symmetric encryption. Pushing the uncertainty to the attacker. 

Learn more about Quantropi’s symmetric encryption suite that includes classic AES-256 along with our own novel QEEP™ algorithm which runs 18x times faster than AES-256 with key sizes up to 100,000 bits.
Submit your QiSpace™ trial request today to get started: https://lnkd.in/gwAu63Rp 

Catch the panel insights at Inside Quantum Technology, New York Oct. 2022 - ‘PQC Products: Who will use them and when’. 
Watch the complete mini-series here: http://bit.ly/3BecXim 
 
#quantum #community #security #quantumtechnology #Y2Q #QuantumThreat #BringItOn #Quantropi #cybersecurity

#IQT_Webisode_3
𝗧𝗿𝘂𝘀𝘁 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗠𝗔𝗦𝗤™ 𝗤𝘂𝗮𝗻𝘁𝘂𝗺-𝗦𝗲𝗰𝘂𝗿𝗲 𝗔𝘀𝘆𝗺𝗺𝗲𝘁𝗿𝗶𝗰 𝗘𝗻𝗰𝗿𝘆𝗽𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻

In this, the third of a 7-part mini-series on migrating to a complete and TrUE cryptographic system, Quantropi Inc. CTO Michael Redding explains the first TrUE building block of a complete cryptographic system – 𝗧𝗿ust, or asymmetric encryption. Establishing that trusted connection between two parties. 

Learn more about Quantropi’s MASQ™ asymmetric product suite that includes NIST finalists along with our own novel PQC algorithm for both Key Exchange and Digital Signature.
Submit your QiSpace™ trial request today to get started: https://lnkd.in/gwAu63Rp 

Catch the panel insights at Inside Quantum Technology, New York Oct. 2022 - ‘PQC Products: Who will use them and when’.
Watch the complete mini-series here: http://bit.ly/3BecXim

#quantum #community #security #quantumtechnology #Y2Q #QuantumThreat #BringItOn #Quantropi #cybersecurity #MichaelRedding #IQT #NewYork

#Quantropi #IQT_WEBISODE_1
𝗠𝗶𝗰𝗵𝗮𝗲𝗹 𝗥𝗲𝗱𝗱𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗮𝘁 𝗤𝘂𝗮𝗻𝘁𝗿𝗼𝗽𝗶
In this, the first of a 7-part mini-series on migrating to a complete and TrUE cryptographic system, Quantropi Inc. CTO Michael Redding, former managing director and co-founder of Accenture Ventures, presents Quantropi Inc. at Inside Quantum Technology (IQT), New York. 

𝗔𝗯𝗼𝘂𝘁 𝗠𝗶𝗸𝗲:
During his 30 years with Accenture, Mike grew a global portfolio of strategic partnerships and 38 equity investments in emerging technology startups. He also incubated and launched technology innovations for enterprises across multiple geographies and industries. 

𝗔𝗯𝗼𝘂𝘁 𝗤𝘂𝗮𝗻𝘁𝗿𝗼𝗽𝗶
By delivering novel cryptographic solutions that preserve truth and trust, Quantropi is bound to become the new standard for quantum-secure data communications as we prepare for Y2Q. Our next-generation technology protects data in motion and data at rest — defending against both today’s threats and tomorrow’s Quantum-based attacks, while eliminating “Steal now, Crack later” reputational risk.

Powered by quantum mechanics expressed as linear algebra, only Quantropi’s patented solutions are capable of all three prerequisites for end-to-end cryptographic quantum security: Trust, Uncertainty, and Entropy.

When it comes to Y2Q preparedness, only Quantropi's QiSpace™ offers TrUE quantum security without the need for new and expensive hardware or infrastructure. And only QiSpace™ has the crypto agility to support a range of available PQC standards, in addition to Quantropi’s proprietary algorithm. This is about readying your organization to deliver on its business promise, whatever’s next. That’s mission-critical.

With Quantropi, QiSpace™ and TrUE… Bring It On.

Meet Mike as he presents Quantropi Inc. at IQT Oct. 2022 - ‘PQC Products: Who will use them and when’.
Watch the complete mini-series here: http://bit.ly/3BecXim

#quantum #community #security #quantumtechnology #Y2Q #QuantumThreat #BringItOn #Quantropi #cybersecurity #MichaelRedding #IQT #NewYork
